attributes.action: level the minimum wage for 16 & 17 year olds to be equal with 18+ year olds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 16 and 17 year olds doing the same job, possibly even working harder,  than slightly older fellow employees, should be on at least an equal minimum wage.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
